subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Love, the 2012 captain, will use a selection process slightly different from last year’s, with changes that seemed a reaction to the fact that two players on a roll were left off last year’s team.
snippet: Love, the 2012 captain, will use a selection process slightly different from last year’s, with changes that seemed a reaction to the fact that two players on a roll were left off last year’s team.
